name: Kumar Abi
tagline: Building robust and scalable web applications from concept to completion.
about: I am a passionate Full Stack Developer with a knack for creating efficient, scalable, and user-friendly web applications. With a strong foundation in both front-end and back-end technologies, I enjoy tackling complex problems and turning ideas into reality. When I'm not coding, I enjoy hiking and exploring new coffee shops.

projects.name: ShopSphere - E-commerce Platform
projects.description: A feature-rich e-commerce platform built with a modern tech stack, featuring product browsing, a secure cart, and Stripe integration for payments.

projects.name: TaskFlow - Project Management Tool
projects.description: A collaborative project management application that helps teams organize tasks, track progress, and communicate effectively in real-time.

projects.name: ChatterBox - Real-Time Chat App
projects.description: A responsive, real-time messaging application allowing users to join rooms and chat. Built with a Node.js backend and WebSockets for instant communication.

projects.name: Insightify - Data Visualization Dashboard
projects.description: An interactive dashboard for visualizing complex datasets with dynamic charts and graphs. Features include data filtering and custom reporting.
